description: Retrieves information about a specific task running on a specific target.

parameters.name: WindowExecutionId
parameters.description: The ID of the maintenance window execution for which the task is a part.

parameters.name: TaskId
parameters.description: The ID of the specific task in the maintenance window task that should be retrieved.

nested_items.name: TaskType
nested_items.description: Retrieves the task type for a maintenance window.

nested_items.name: Parameters
nested_items.description: The parameters used at the time that the task ran.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The task status for an invocation.

nested_items.name: StatusDetails
nested_items.description: The details explaining the status. Details are only available for certain status values.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The time that the task started running on the target.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The time that the task finished running on the target.

nested_items.name: OwnerInformation
nested_items.description: User-provided value to be included in any Amazon CloudWatch Events or Amazon EventBridge events raised while running tasks for these targets in this maintenance window.
